Desc.entry: Provides a full range of housing services offered by Sheffield Homes. Advice and information also available on a wide range of City Council services including housing and council tax benefits, schools and free school meals, parking badges for disabled people (Blue Badge Scheme, see separate entry), garden refuse sacks, Neighbourhoods and Community Care equipment and adaptations, Sheffield City Council and Sheffield Homes job vacancies. Facilities for customers include baby-changing, shredding service, free phones providing direct access to other Council services, fully accessible building, internet access, loop system for those with hearing difficulties and access to translated information and interpretation services.
